Ingredients.10: 1 (20 ounce) can pineapple chunks, thoroughly drained

Directions.1: Place chicken in a large pot of lightly salted water, and bring to a boil; simmer until tender and cooked through, about 25 minutes. Drain, set aside. When cool enough to handle, chop coarsely, and place into a large bowl.

Directions.2: In a separate bowl, stir together mayonnaise, curry powder, lemon juice, and soy sauce.

Directions.3: Stir into the chopped chicken 2 1/4 cups of the toasted almonds. Stir in grapes, celery, water chestnuts, and pineapple. Gently fold in all but 1/2 cup of the dressing. Cover, and refrigerate salad and reserved dressing for several hours (or overnight).

Directions.4: Before serving, adjust dressing to taste, and garnish with paprika and remaining 1/4 cup almonds.
